name: Syringe Hospital
description:
Your Waking Up From A Coma And Your Scared And Theres No Way Out And 

Dr. Evilo Hates People When He did Surgery On A Guy Named PAUL SWENSON

And He Got Killed By Dr. Evilo And Dr. Evilo Got Sued For 5Million Dollars

And He Said No. So he Killed Them With His Mallet And Now Your Stuck With Him.
